mapper.select: select an_no, e_no, an_distinct, an_deduction, to_char(an_start_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as an_startDate, to_char(an_end_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as an_endDate, an_acknowledge from annual where e_no = #{e_no} order by an_no desc
select an_no, e_no, an_distinct, an_deduction, to_char(an_start_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as an_startDate, to_char(an_end_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as an_endDate, an_acknowledge from annual order by an_no desc
